column5: Morning all....brrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr.  Was a bit chilly out this morning, wife has always wanted to throw a bucket of water up and turn it to ice...she succeeded. I had to try too...lol...cool...literally!  Now i have to go and clear all the snowdrifts then i'm going for some trout.    COOL!

Haha good stuff. -25 with a 10 degree wind chill in Nbay this morning. I nearly lost some fingerprints to a piece of metal! Yikes! Love it though... This cold spell should add a couple inches of ice to the snow-barren lakes
How cold does it have to be for this to happen? The mrs,s wants to try this.
Nice and warm here Simon! at least according to that other thread, hahahaha.  She is making nice ice!!!! brrrr.
-25 = warm winter day where I live.
I believe one of the coldest places in Ontario was Timmins this morning with -41 degrees celcius.

Cool video Simon.  Reminds me of when I was a hired hand on a farm.  In the winter we would rebuild combines.  I had to clean them first.  The pressure washer was more like an ice blaster on the super cold days..
About the only good thing about not going metric is F* numbers give the perception it is warmer than it is.    Art
